name: Element Solutions Inc.
description: Element Solutions Inc. is a global specialty chemicals company that provides innovative solutions to the electronics, industrial, and automotive industries. Established in 2019, the company operates through two main segments: Electronics and Industrial & Specialty. Element Solutions is recognized for its high-performance products that enhance the performance of its customers' end products. In the Electronics segment, the company offers advanced materials for the manufacturing of semiconductors, printed circuit boards, and other electronic components. This includes a wide range of chemistries that meet the stringent requirements of today's technology. In the Industrial & Specialty segment, Element Solutions produces products used in coatings, adhesives, and surface treatments, catering to a diverse array of applications. With a focus on sustainability, the company is committed to reducing its environmental footprint while providing high-quality and efficient solutions to its customers. Driven by innovation, Element Solutions invests significantly in research and development to stay at the forefront of technology and meet the evolving needs of the industries it serves. The company's mission is to deliver exceptional value to its customers while fostering a culture of safety and sustainability in all its operations.
